name: Instant Pot® Collard Greens
author: Trevor Barrett
summary: Quick Southern-style collard greens made in your Instant Pot®.
ingredients: 4 thick slices bacon, cut into 1-inch pieces
directions: Rinse  ; remove and discard thick parts of stems
Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function
Cook bacon until brown and crisp, about 5 minutes
Scrape the bottom of the pot to release stuck bits of bacon
Add collard greens and stir to coat
Pour in chicken broth and season with salt
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 5 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions for 20 minutes
Quick-release remaining steam, according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes
Season with more salt if necessary
